price: Кейин куфр келтирганларни ушладим. Бас, инкорим қандай бўлди?!
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
